Class HttpRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.HttpRequestHandler

extends java.lang.Object
    Holder class to handle HTTP request
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  HttpRequestHandler.HTTPContainer
      Holder inner class holding http client, context and other http stuff
      static interface  HttpRequestHandler.ProcessorCallback
      Binder callback fires when the request is finished

      • httpRequests

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,HttpRequestHandler.HTTPContainer> httpRequests
        HashMap to store HttpRequestHandler.HTTPContainer corresponding to RESTRequest

        • key : the ID of the request
        • value : the HttpRequestHandler.HTTPContainer instance
